title: Rodney Crowell - Sex And Gasoline (2008)

 Genre: Country Songwriter

While Rodney Crowell first gained widespread recognition as a leader of the new traditionalist movement of the mid-&#039;80s, he in fact was a singer, songwriter, and producer with roots and ambitions extending far beyond the movement&#039;s parameters.

In a size zero culture where heroin chic starvation and the teenage archetypal whore ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â» a la a certain pop singer unraveling before the media&#039;s watchful eye - is the measure by which young women are forced to assess their sexual relevance, I&#039;ve been witness to the toll Bulimia, Anorexia and other abuses can take on a good many would-be Goddesses. You can&#039;t be too famous and too skinny has replaced the old adage sit tight and the boys will catch up with you at around age thirty-six.

As far as the gasoline part, one needs only to turn on the news. You might say the record is about modern society strip-mining the feminine mystique . . . that and how good I sang and played.
